form.title: New Test Run
form.description: Configure the parameters for your next test run.
form.urlDescription: The full URL of the page you want to test or audit.
form.testSuitesDescription: Select which test suites you want to run against the target URL.
form.k6SwitchDescription: Simulate traffic with k6 to measure backend performance.
form.lighthouseSwitchDescription: Run Google Lighthouse for performance, SEO, and accessibility.
form.seoSwitchDescription: Perform a deep technical SEO analysis using AI.

error.atLeastOne: You must select at least one test suite to run.

form.requestConfigDescription: Define the HTTP request details for the k6 load test.
form.loadProfileDescription: Define the amount of load to generate during the test.
form.customProfileDescription: Define a fixed number of VUs and duration, or create a custom ramping profile.
form.stagesDescription: Define ramping stages for more complex load patterns.

toast.historyClearedDescription: Previous test history and recent URLs have been cleared.
toast.testStartedDescription: Your test run has started. You will be notified upon completion.

clearHistoryDialog.title: Clear Previous History?
clearHistoryDialog.description: To ensure accurate metrics, especially for soak tests, it's recommended to clear old data from InfluxDB before starting a new run. Do you want to clear all previous history and recent URLs?

running.title: Test Running...
running.description: Please do not navigate away from this page. You can monitor the live Grafana dashboard for load test progress.

summary.title: Test Summary
summary.description: The results for your test run on {{url}}
summary.noK6Data: k6 load test was not run.

history.title: Test History
history.description: Review, re-run, or export your past test results.
history.searchPlaceholder: Search by URL or Test ID...
history.noHistoryDescription: Run a test to see its results here.

toast.exportSuccessDescription: Your test history has been saved to a JSON file.
toast.importSuccessDescription: Test history has been successfully loaded.
toast.importFailDescription: An error occurred while importing the file.
toast.deleteSuccessDescription: The selected test run has been removed from your history.
toast.clearSuccessDescription: All test history and recent URLs have been deleted.

clearAllDialog.title: Are you absolutely sure?
clearAllDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your entire test history and list of recent URLs.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.description: This action will permanently delete this test run from your history.

about.title: About K6 Commander
about.description: K6 Commander is a lightweight, local-first, authorized load-testing platform. It allows you to configure, run, and analyze load tests, Lighthouse audits, and basic SEO checks directly from a sleek web UI.
about.localFirstDescription: Your data is yours. All test configurations and results are stored in your browser's LocalStorage, never on our servers.
about.unifiedToolingDescription: We bring together the best open-source tools (k6, Lighthouse) into a single, cohesive interface to streamline your workflow.
about.k6FeatureDescription: Run powerful load tests with k6, configurable directly from the UI.
about.k6HowItWorks: When you run a load test, the application spins up a temporary k6 Docker container. The configuration from the UI is passed as environment variables to a generic k6 script.
about.k6HowItWorks2: The k6 container sends its metrics to a local InfluxDB instance, which are then visualized in real-time in the embedded Grafana dashboard.
about.lighthouseFeatureDescription: Get comprehensive site audits powered by Google Lighthouse.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks: The Lighthouse audit runs as a separate Node.js process using the official lighthouse package. It audits the target URL and generates a full JSON and HTML report.
about.lighthouseHowItWorks2: The scores are summarized in the UI, and a link is provided to view the full, interactive HTML report.
about.seoFeatureDescription: Go beyond standard checks with AI-driven technical SEO analysis.
about.seoHowItWorks: The app fetches the raw HTML of your URL and sends it to a secure Genkit AI flow. The AI agent is prompted to analyze key on-page SEO elements like title tags, meta descriptions, canonicals, and more.
about.seoHowItWorks2: The AI not only identifies issues but also provides actionable recommendations for how to fix them, helping you optimize your site more effectively.
about.stackDescription: K6 Commander is built with modern, powerful, and open-source technologies.
about.involvedDescription: This project is open-source and community-driven. We welcome contributions of all kinds, from bug reports to new features.

tour.step1: First, enter the full URL of the website you want to test.
tour.step2: Next, choose which tests you want to run. You can run any combination of a k6 load test, a Lighthouse audit, or an AI-powered SEO analysis.
tour.step3: If running a load test, you can select a preset or define a custom load profile with virtual users, duration, and stages.
tour.step4: Once you're ready, click here to start the tests. You'll be taken to a new screen to monitor the progress.
